meals.name: Margherita Pizza
meals.description: A classic Italian pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.

meals.name: Sushi
meals.description: A Japanese dish consisting of vinegared rice accompanied by various ingredients, including seafood and vegetables.

meals.name: Tacos
meals.description: A traditional Mexican dish made of corn or wheat tortilla folded or rolled around a filling.

meals.name: Butter Chicken
meals.description: A popular Indian dish made with marinated chicken in a creamy tomato sauce.

meals.name: Pad Thai
meals.description: A stir-fried rice noodle dish commonly served as street food in Thailand.

meals.name: Beef Stroganoff
meals.description: A Russian dish of sautéed beef in a creamy sauce served with noodles or rice.

meals.name: Falafel Wrap
meals.description: A Middle Eastern dish made of ground chickpeas, served in a pita with vegetables and tahini sauce.

meals.name: Greek Salad
meals.description: A fresh salad made with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese, dressed with olive oil.

meals.name: Chicken Adobo
meals.description: A Filipino dish made of chicken marinated in vinegar, soy sauce, and garlic, then simmered to perfection.

meals.name: Ramen
meals.description: A Japanese noodle soup dish with rich broth, often topped with slices of meat, nori, and green onions.

meals.name: Quiche Lorraine
meals.description: A savory French tart filled with cream, eggs, cheese, and bacon.

meals.name: Biryani
meals.description: A flavorful South Asian dish made with spiced rice and marinated meat or vegetables.

meals.name: Ceviche
meals.description: A Latin American dish of raw fish marinated in citrus juices, often served with onions and cilantro.

meals.name: Korean BBQ
meals.description: A popular Korean cooking method where various meats are grilled at the table.

meals.name: Moussaka
meals.description: A Greek casserole made with layers of eggplant, minced meat, and béchamel sauce.

meals.name: Shakshuka
meals.description: A North African dish of poached eggs in a sauce of tomatoes, chili peppers, and onions.

meals.name: Poutine
meals.description: A Canadian dish consisting of fries topped with cheese curds and gravy.

meals.name: Goulash
meals.description: A Hungarian stew of meat and vegetables, seasoned with paprika and other spices.

meals.name: Fried Rice
meals.description: A dish made from pre-cooked rice that is stir-fried in a wok with ingredients such as vegetables, eggs, and meat.

meals.name: Spanakopita
meals.description: A Greek pastry filled with spinach and feta cheese, wrapped in flaky phyllo dough.
